description.lang: Aeotec MultiSensor 6 looks like a motion sensor and it acts like one too. But its also so much more. Installing this 1 piece of Z-Wave technology is the same as installing 6 pieces of Z-Wave technology. Your home control network will immediately understand motion, temperature, humidity, light, Ultraviolet and Vibration readings wherever MultiSensor installed. Those intelligent readings will equate to intelligence automation. And intelligent automation will give you the perfect, smart home.

The MultiSensor supports 1 association group. Group 1 is assigned to the Lifeline association group and can add max 5 association nodes.When the PIR motion sensor is triggered, the MultiSensor will send Basic Set (0xFF) to the associated nodes. If no PIR motion is triggered after the PIR interval time (configurable), the MultiSensor will send Basic Set (0x00) to the associated nodes.The automatically reports of temperature, humidity, luminance and ultraviolet (configurable) also can be sent to the associated nodes.

name.lang: Set the parameter 101-103 to default values.

description.lang: Set the parameter 101-103 to default values.
Set the parameter 101-103 to default values.

name.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 1

description.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 1.Note:You can also set all sensor reports to be sent out at the same time. E.g. If you want the batter report and temperature report to be sent out at the same time, you just need to set the configuration value to 33 (1+32).

name.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 2

description.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 2.Note:You can also set all sensor reports to be sent out at the same time. E.g. If you want the batter report and temperature report to be sent out at the same time, you just need to set the configuration value to 33 (1+32).

name.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 3

description.lang: To set which report would be sent in Report group 3.Note:You can also set all sensor reports to be sent out at the same time. E.g. If you want the batter report and temperature report to be sent out at the same time, you just need to set the configuration value to 33 (1+32).

name.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 1

description.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 1

name.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 2

description.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 2

name.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 3

description.lang: To set the interval time of sending reports in Report group 3

name.lang: Enable/Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

description.lang: Enable/Disable waking up for 10 minutes when re-power on (battery mode) the MultiSensor.

name.lang: Temperature sensor calibration

description.lang: Temperature sensor calibration.Note:1.High byte is the calibration value. Low byte is the unit (0x01=Celsius, 0x02=Fahrenheit)2.The calibration value (high byte) contains one decimal point. E.g. if the value is set to 20 (0x1401), the calibration value is 2.0(EU/AU version) or if the value is set to 20 (0x1402), the calibration value is 2.0 (US version)3.The calibration value (high byte) = standard value - measure value.E.g.If measure value =25.3 and the standard value = 23.2, so the calibration value= 23.2 - 25.3= -2.1 (0xEB).If the measure value =30.1 and the standard value = 33.2, so the calibration value= 33.2 - 30.1=3.1 (0x1F).

name.lang: Humidity sensor calibration

description.lang: Humidity sensor calibration.The calibration value = standard value - measure value.E.g.If measure value =80RH and the standard value = 75RH, so the calibration value= 75RH80RH= -5RH (0xFB).If the measure value =85RH and the standard value = 90RH, so the calibration value= 90RH85RH=5RH (0x05).

name.lang: Luminance sensor calibration

description.lang: Luminance sensor calibration.The calibration value = standard value - measure value.E.g.If measure value =800Lux and the standard value = 750Lux, so the calibration value= 750800= -50 (0xFFCE).If the measure value =850Lux and the standard value = 900Lux, so the calibration value= 900850=50 (0x0032)

name.lang: Ultraviolet sensor calibration

description.lang: Ultraviolet sensor calibration.The calibration value = standard value - measure value.E.g.If measure value =9 and the standard value = 8, so the calibration value= 89= -1 (0xFE).If the measure value =7 and the standard value = 9, so the calibration value= 97=2 (0x02).

name.lang: Enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked

description.lang: Enable/disable all configuration parameters to be locked.

name.lang: Reset to factory defaults.

description.lang: Reset all configuration parameters to factory defaults.
Reset the product to factory defaults.

name.lang: Set the PIR time.

description.lang: The default PIR time is 4 minutes. The Multisensor will send BASIC SET CC (0x00) to the associated nodes if no motion is triggered again in 4 minutes.
The range of PIR time is 10 to 3600.

name.lang: Configure the default low battery value.

description.lang: Configure the default low battery value. When the current battery level is lower than this value, it will send out the low battery alarm.

name.lang: Set the sensitivity of the motion sensor.

description.lang: This parameter changes the sensitivity level of the motion detector.

name.lang: Enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage

description.lang: Enable/disable the selective reporting only when measurements reach a certain threshold or percentage. This is used to reduce network traffic.Note: If USB power, the Sensor will check the threshold every 10 seconds. If battery power, the Sensor will check the threshold when it is waken up.

name.lang: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in temperature to induce an automatic report. Note:1.The unit is Fahrenheit for US version, Celsius for EU/AU version.2.High byte is the threshold value. Low byte is the unit (0x01=Celsius, 0x02=Fahrenheit).3.The threshold value (high byte) contains one decimal point. E.g. if the value is set to 20 (0x001401), the threshold value =2.0(EU/AU version) or if the value is set to 20 (0x001402), the threshold value= 2.0(US version). When the current temperature gap is more then 2.0, which will induce a temperature report to be sent out.
Available rang of threshold is 1 to 212.

name.lang: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report

description.lang: Threshold change in humidity to induce an automatic report.Note:1.The unit is %.2.The default value is 10, which means that if the current humidity gap is more than 10%, it will send out a humidity report.

name.lang: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in luminance to induce an automatic report.
Available rang is 1 LUX to 30000 LUX.

name.lang: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in battery level to induce an automatic report.Note:1.The unit is %.2.The default value is 10, which means that if the current battery level gap is more than 10%, it will send out a battery report.

name.lang: Threshold change in ultraviolet to induce an automatic report.

description.lang: Threshold change in ultraviolet to induce an automatic report.

name.lang: Enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature

description.lang: Enable/disable to send the alarm report of low temperature(<-15).Note:If it is enabled, the MultiSensor will send a report of Multi Level Temperature CC to controller when the current temperature is less than -15).

name.lang: Enable/disable to send a report when the measurement is more than the upper limit value or less than the lower limit value.

description.lang: Enable/disable to send a report when the measurement is more than the upper limit value or less than the lower limit value.

name.lang: Set the upper limit value of temperature sensor.

description.lang: Set the upper limit value of temperature sensor.When the measurement is more than this upper limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Which command would be sent when the motion sensor triggered.

description.lang: To set which command would be sent when the motion sensor triggered.

name.lang: Set the lower limit value of temperature sensor.

description.lang: Set the lower limit value of temperature sensor. When the measurement is less than this lower limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.High byte is the lower limit value.

name.lang: Set the upper limit value of humidity sensor.

description.lang: Set the upper limit value of humidity sensor. when the measurement is more than this upper limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the lower limit value of humidity sensor.

description.lang: Set the lower limit value of humidity sensor. When the measurement is less than this lower limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the upper limit value of Lighting sensor

description.lang: Set the upper limit value of Lighting sensor. When the measurement is more than this upper limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the lower limit value of Lighting sensor.

description.lang: Set the lower limit value of Lighting sensor. When the measurement is less than this lower limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the upper limit value of ultraviolet sensor.

description.lang: Set the upper limit value of ultraviolet sensor. When the measurement is more than this upper limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the lower limit value of ultraviolet sensor.

description.lang: Set the lower limit value of ultraviolet sensor. When the measurement is less than this upper limit, which will trigger to sent out a sensor report.

name.lang: Set the recover limit value of temperature sensor.

description.lang: Note:1.When the current measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit), the upper limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is more than the upper limit. After that the upper limit report would be disabled again until the measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit).2.When the current measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit), the lower limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is less than the lower limit. After that the lower limit report would be disabled again until the measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit).3.High byte is the recover limit value. Low byte is the unit (0x01=Celsius, 0x02=Fahrenheit).

name.lang: Set the recover limit value of humidity sensor.

description.lang: Set the recover limit value of humidity sensor.Note:1.When the current measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit), the upper limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is more than the upper limit. After that the upper limit report would be disabled again until the measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit).2.When the current measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit), the lower limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is less than the lower limit. After that the lower limit report would be disabled again until the measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit).

name.lang: Set the recover limit value of Lighting sensor.

description.lang: Set the recover limit value of Lighting sensor.Note:1.When the current measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit), the upper limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is more than the upper limit. After that the upper limit report would be disabled again until the measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit).2.When the current measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit), the lower limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is less than the lower limit. After that the lower limit report would be disabled again until the measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit).3.Unit = 10Recover limit (Lux)

name.lang: Set the recover limit value of Ultraviolet sensor.

description.lang: Set the recover limit value of Ultraviolet sensor.Note:1.When the current measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit), the upper limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is more than the upper limit. After that the upper limit report would be disabled again until the measurement <= (Upper limitRecover limit).2.When the current measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit), the lower limit report is enabled and then it would send out a sensor report when the next measurement is less than the lower limit. After that the lower limit report would be disabled again until the measurement >= (Lower limit + Recover limit).
Keep sleep state for Battery power mode
Keep awake for 10 minutes for battery power mode.

name.lang: Get the out-of-limit state of the Sensors.

description.lang: Get the out-of-limit state of the Sensors.
Temperature sensor is out of the lower limit
Humidity sensor is out of the lower limit
Luminance sensor is out of the lower limit
Ultraviolet sensor is out of the lower limit
Temperature sensor is out of the upper limit
Humidity sensor is out of the upper limit
Luminance sensor is out of the upper limit
Ultraviolet sensor is out of the upper limit

description.lang: Enable/disable the LED blinking when the PIR is triggered.
